title: The Odyssey | PART 2 of 2 | FULL MOVIE | Classic Adventure, Mythology

sources.title: The Odyssey | PART 2 of 2 | FULL MOVIE | Classic Adventure, Mythology
sources.description:
The Odyssey PART TWO -- Homer's Odyssey is magnificently recreated for television. Homer's engaging and edifying tale recounts the journey of Odysseus, king of Ithaca and mastermind of the Greek victory in the Trojan War, survives ten years of trials and temptations thrown in his way by angry gods.

Watch part ONE here if you missed it: https://youtu.be/VwdoA0_t2vI

Armand Assante, Charlie Lucas, Greta Scacchi, Geraldine Chaplin, Jeroen Krabbe, Christopher Lee, Bernadette Peters, Isabella Rossellini, Vanessa Williams

1997
Directed by Andrey Konchalovskiy
